originalText.text: Nikola is a phenomenal partner that helped us through every stage of our condo purchase in one of the most difficult real estate market in the past decades. As first time buyers, we really appreciate Nikola spending the time to educate us on the market and the key considerations specific to our needs, which, as you can imagine, goes a long way than this particular transaction itself. In addition, Nikola is always available to address any questions and concerns day and night, rain or shine. He doesn’t let a single thing slip or unanswered. This level of extra care made us feel extremely supported even in the infant stage of our process - a trait quite rare in the brokerage business. Last but not the least, Nikola is very analytically driven and detail oriented. He always stands with the reasons and the facts extract insightful perspectives that others or the internet just could not offer. I have never felt throughout the whole process that I was pushed or persuaded to make an irrational decision, which tells you Nikola always puts his clients’ interest above his own. We have been through all kinds of difficult situations: competitive bidders, unrealistic sellers, hidden unit damages, absent legal counsels, rescinded offers, but we conquered all with Nikola’s help. We are now sitting in our new home and first home in New York genuinely recommending anyone interested in buying or selling to consult Nikola.

originalText.text: Working with Nikola is an absolute dream. He is capable, detail oriented and seems to know all the ins and outs of the real estate market. I was fortunate enough to work with Niko twice; once when I purchased an apartment and once when I sold and I was thoroughly impressed with him on both occasions. When selling, his expertise really shined…helping me to set the list price properly, which allowed multiple offers. He then negotiated those offers to get me the exact right buyers at the best price. Without him, I doubt I would have been so successful. And I can’t forget to mention that he is warm, sensitive, thoughtful and the perfect amount of calm confidence to handle all of the ups and downs of real estate transactions.

originalText.text: Nikola helped us complete our first apartment purchase in New York City.  We had very specific requirements because of our personal and financial situation which he was able to prove great advice for.  He fully understands the different issues around NYC property requirements and is able to provide great advice for first time home buyers.  He made everything so easy, despite the fact that we did everything virtually until the actual day of apartment walk through and closing.   We are so happy with him that we are planning to continue our working with him.

originalText.text: Nikola is fantastic! He found the perfect rental apartment for us in Manhattan. Being from Los Angeles, we didn’t have a good knowledge of the market.  Nikola took all the time we needed to understand the dynamics of each neighborhood. He is knowledgeable, energetic, prompt, and patient. He was tireless in searching for an apartment that fit our needs, wants, and budget. He really knows each submarket thoroughly and presented himself in a friendly, professional manner throughout our search. He made the search easy, which is rare in a NYC apartment hunt. He’s truly a gem!

originalText.text: Nikola is a diligent, generous, and skilled miracle worker. He helped me sell a condo difficult to sell and helped me a purchase a needle in a haystack. Whenever a problem arose it was overcome. He put in so much extra effort without complaint. Recommended without reservation.
